tha-ap542:11.4: daḷhaṃ kaṇhāsi sā → daḷhaṃ kaṇhā siyā (si) | ḍayhakaṇhā silā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | daḷhakaṇhā siyā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap542:28.3: Diṭṭhiṃ no → diṭṭhiṃ ne (bj) | diṭṭhaṃ no (si) | diṭṭhinte (sya1ed, sya2ed) | diṭṭhi no (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap542:33.4: vātarogehi pīḷito → vācāyābhisupīḷito (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vātarogī supīḷito (mr)
